title: Fun & Casual Music Pack
description: IMAscore’s Fun & Casual Music Pack contains 20 high quality music tracks including loop versions of each track, which are a perfect match for casual games of all kinds of style.
longDescription:
﻿IMAscore’s Fun & Casual Music Pack contains 20 high quality music tracks including loop versions of each track, which are a perfect match for casual games of all kinds of style. All tracks are royalty free, mixed and mastered, ready to use!


PREVIEW: https://youtu.be/dm-k0CAxLz0


Content:

  1. Strolling Through Town [02:58] + Loop [02:56]
  2. Space Saga Funk [02:41] + Loop [02:40]
  3. Happy Garden Life [02:34] + Loop [2:32]
  4. Little Feet [02:48] + Loop [02:42]
  5. Pitchforks And Chickens [02:06] + Loop [02:00]
  6. Summerday [02:01] + Loop [02:00]
  7. Easy Walking [02:52] + Loop [02:46]
  8. Funny Riddle [01:54] + Loop [01:52]
  9. Hidden Nuts [03:27] + Loop [03:24]
  10. Butterfly Meadows [02:33] + Loop [02:31]
  11. Furry And Furious [02:17] + Loop [02:16]
  12. A New Day [02:03] + Loop [01:58]
  13. Happy Ukulele [02:16] + Loop [02:09]
  14. Mr. Little [01:38] + Loop [01:33]
  15. Casual [01:31] + Loop [01:29]
  16. Fat Guy [01:34] + Loop [01:30]
  17. Mowing The Grass [02:27] + Loop [02:25]
  18. Fetch The Ball [03:05] + Loop [03:03]
  19. Cute Reggae [02:22] + Loop [02:21]
  20. Take Your Time [02:31] + Loop [02:24]
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Audio Wavs: 40
  • Audio Cues: 20 (choose between loop and single track version)
  • Format: 44.1 kHz, 16 bit, Stereo, WAV
  • Size: 1.03 GB
  • Does music loop: Yes
  • Minutes of audio provided: 1h 34min 09sec
  • Supported Platforms: All




Who we are

IMAscore is a leading audio production studio, bringing you cutting edge music and sound since 2009. We are a team of composers and sound designers and proved our versatility with hundreds of projects we’re proud to be a part of, from Trailer Music for blockbuster movies or AAA games to all those small and big projects from all kinds of areas.

And you know what? We love games – we always did! That’s why we want to give your projects the high-quality audio they deserve, with releases designed to meet the needs of the game industry. Rest assured: This is just the beginning of a highscore beating, emotion blasting and goosebumps creating relationship!

In case you don’t find what you’re looking for in the asset packs we’re offering right now, we know how to handle your very individual ideas and wishes! You won’t regret getting in touch with us!
